ygData.subject: Re: Dual Wielding Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: No matter what ye do, get a Dragoon Dagger.  I am currently using a PGT and an Obsidian Shard as my two weapons, and have the dagger in the ranged slot so I
ygData.messageBody:
No matter what ye do, get a Dragoon Dagger. I am currently using a PGT and
an Obsidian Shard as my two weapons, and have the dagger in the ranged slot
so I keep the buffs (Since I don't use range attack anyway, there's no
chance of me accidentally throwing it )



-=B=-
28th and holding on Rathe
-----Original Message-----
From: Eric Cathell <embroidery@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 9:05 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Dual Wielding Bards


>From: "Eric Cathell" <embroidery@...>
>
>Ok this question maybe moot...but once we start dual wielding what's a good
>combination? I currently have a combine scim..and was thinking of a combine
>spear or rapier...Sure i know everyone's favorite is Dvinn's dagger...and
if
>i can that's what i will get..but playing on the TS makes things a little
>harder to come by sometimes. So any thoughts?
>
>Jalaric
>12 Song
>Test Server
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 9:41 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Level 43 song - Desperate Dirge
>
>
>From: <kim@...>
>
>On Tue, 26 Oct 1999, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
>>
>> I know that my enchanter buddy has to be careful about when, where and
how
>> he uses his Mesmerization (Equivalent to our Lullaby). If not, he
>> accidentally mesmerizes himself. It's funny because sometimes he'll just
>> be standing there, and someone will comment "Whassa matter? Goin' to
>sleep
>> on us?" and he'll reply just as soon as he can, "As a matter of fact,
>yes!"
>
>You can type just fine while mesmerized. You can't type while
>charmed. And I've done it to myself with both mesmerize and
>Pixie Strike (both targeted). If you accidently hit the tab
>key before hitting the spell/song button, you end up
>targetting yourself.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with
>the subject lol.
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
with the subject lol.
>
